about_the_game:
Phobic Nightmares is a first-person psychological horror game where you're investigating your sister's disappearance.
Find notes from your sister and her team to find out exactly what happened, and why.
P.S.: It's not pleasant.

  • NIGHTMARISH CHALLENGES

Face increasingly difficult challenges as the entity that you're facing keeps altering the environment. You haven't felt real dread till now.


  • UNCOVER THE SECRETS

You're looking for your sister, and your biggest fear is becoming true. She went inside the forbidden abandoned mansion. Explore the mansion and it's surroundings to find out what's so truly wrong with it.


  • FEEL THE HORROR

The game is made with realistic graphics and immersive audios in mind, but most importantly, the behavior of the supernatural entity is what makes real horror.




Disclaimer: You're obligated to leave this page if you can't stomach true horror.

short_description: Phobic Nightmares is a psychological horror game where you experience nightmarish realities to uncover what happened to your sister. Find notes from your sister and use the sacrifices of those who came before you to uncover what’s hidden and avoid ending up like them.
